overview: Gonzalo Miranda holds board positions at ACAFI (Chilean Venture Capital & Private Equity Association), Scopix, Paperless, Atakama Labs, Multicaja, Producto Protegido, Chile Patrimonial (non-profit) and Instituto Chileno Norteamericano de Cultura (non-profit). He is member of the Society of Kauffman Fellows (www.kauffmanfellows.org) and Adjunt Professor of Entrepreneurship at Universidad Católica de Chile. Prior to founding Austral, Gonzalo was the Managing Director of Endeavor Chile. Other past activities include co-founder of Aflora, an ecommerce retail business; VP of New Business Development at Canal 13, a media conglomerate in broadcast TV, cable and web where he led the spin-off division, Medios Australes; and founder of the Chile Chapter of the Haas School of Business/UC Berkeley alumni network. Gonzalo holds a BSc. and MSc. in Mechanical Engineering from Universidad Católica de Chile and an MBA & MOT (Management of Technology) from the Haas School of Business at the University of California, Berkeley.
